title: Toxic Player
body:
Started champ select. Said "Sup boys." Ready to play a fun game. Asked how come I never see Taric players anymore. Then out of freaking nowhere, the WW and Diana begin to tell me inhumane things about my (deceased) mother. They called her a whore and 10x worse as champ select progressed. I told them that was the last time I would talk and they continued to bash me. The replay has all the proof. They flamed the hell out of me. I muted them in game yet my TEAM was laughing and saying stuff like "Yeah WW thats funny." And told me, "It's just words dude." 

It's actually not just words when I have a breakdown and cry during a game cause my mom passed away a few months ago. This was seriously the worst representation of humanity I ever, ever, ever experienced. **I'm seriously asking here if I can get a personal email about what is going to happen to these two players**. I've never been more passionate about a report in my life. I had an anxiety attack because of these really mean human beings. 

Acid Butterfly was the Diana
Petimus Crediumus was the WW.

http://imgur.com/iB5gfNd

That's what he said at the end. I muted them so I don't even want to imagine what they said then.

Please Riot, you can't let toxic people like this just get away with it. Can you please contact me personally about this. 
luffyandzoe@gmail.com

replies.body: Looks like they were duo :/, toxic duo. I hope they get punished because this is unacceptable.

As someone who's also lost their parents, trust me when I say I feel for you here buddy. That is definitely not cool, and regardless of how it's meant those are not joking matters. 

Rest assured that we do look at those reports, and with enough action will be taken. If you feel like reporting just isn't enough, take those screenshots and any others you might have and shoot those over to our player behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). I'm sure they will be more than happy to investigate.
